project.name: platform :: talend :: tesb
project.description:
This platform bom pom uses dependencyManagement imports for component Apache projects and Talend ESB to establish a consistent set of dependency versions for use by apps built on Talend ESB.
It also provides a single point of control to tweak dependencies if needed, e.g. the spring framework to exclude commons logging.
In general, properties defined here should match those found in the tesb pom for org.talend.esb:esb-parent.
The tesb adds the Spring bom pom used by Talend ESB.
The tesb does not depend on Spring Boot.
Projects seeking to import the tesb with Spring Boot should use a version of Spring Boot compatible with the version of Spring used here. Such projects should import the org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-dependencies pom.
